name: Raffael and his javelin.
description:
I made this game for the birthday of my brother, and now I'm publishing  it here!

My first game was made in GB Studio.

It's a short retro game about a story of a guy and his javelin.

Languages:

-Português

-English

You can play this game with a Game Boy emulator.

***********
New: Now you can  play on browser!

New: Now you can play on phone!

***********

Please leave a comment!

 If you want to support me, make a donate hitting the download button!

Thanks for playing! =D
